text:
TO: NAEB E. D. Committee
PROM: Prank Schooley
RE: Skomia.
lo The following telegram was received by me today:
"SA178 SXA265
SoCDU250 33 PD INTLsCD VIENNA VIA RCA 8 1715
Id? MR PRANK SCHOOLEY
UNIVERSITY OP URBANA (ILL)
DEFINITELY INTERESTED IN OFFER CONTAINED YOUR WIRE OP
SEPTEMBER 12th RECEIVED ONLY TODAY IP PERMANENT STOP
APPRECIATE FURTHER INFO STOP AVAILABLE MAY STOP
H J SKORNIA*
2o By way of explanation, the embassy in Vienna didn®t deliver
the wire to Skomia for some reason. Some flunky
thought it was a broadside looking for help. It found
way back to Urbana, in hands of a State department
representative, who called me to see why I°d sent that
cable to Austria. I told him in no uncertain terms
what I thought about failure to deliver. He sent fast
word back to Vienna.
3. If I may suggest, I believe this now calls for some
letter of explanation by the chairman, Graydon Ausmuso
I merely suggest this so that matter isn8t left undone.
If I am to act further regarding Skomia, Ausmus please
advise.
10-9-52
